import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; export default class expensecreate extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ taxx:[], gs:[], st:[], ex:[], taxx:[], expense_type:' ', date:' ', notes:' ', category:' ', gst:' ', destination_of_supply:' ', intra_state_tax:' ', inter_state_tax:' ', customer:[ { id:' ', first_name:' ', last_name:' ', display_name:' ' } ], } } changeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } async componentDidMount() { await axios.get("https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/persons_manager/customer/?ordering=created_at") .then(res => { this.setState({customer:res.data}) console.log(res) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err); }) await axios.get("https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/shared/gst/?ordering=created_at") .then(res => { var t=res.data.length; for(var i=0;i { console.log(err); }) await axios.get("https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/invoice/expense_category/?ordering=created_at") .then(res => { var t=res.data.length; for(var i=0;i { console.log(err); }) await axios.get("https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/shared/state/?ordering=created_at") .then(res => { var t=res.data.length; for(var i=0;i { console.log(err); }) await axios.get("https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/shared/tax/?ordering=created_at") .then(res => { var t=res.data.length; for(var i=0;i { console.log(err) }) } render() { var someDate = new Date(); someDate.setDate(someDate.getDate() + 0); var da = someDate.toISOString().substr(0, 10); let customerss=this.state.customer; let customers=customerss.map((cust) => ) return (
